definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Since the football has lost air, we shall need a pump to inflate it.
sentences.chinese: 這個球漏氣了，我們需要一個氣筒打氣。

sentences.english: Japan web flat blanket, leak-proof, aging resistance.
sentences.chinese: 日本網平橡皮布，防漏氣，耐老化。

sentences.english: Can you smell a gas leak?
The man jacked up his car to fix a flat tire.
sentences.chinese: 那人用千斤頂把他的汽車頂起以修理漏氣的輪胎。

sentences.english: In case air leakage occurs, please repair or replace the pneumatic components which may cause the leakage without any delay.
sentences.chinese: 如有漏氣現象，應及時修理或更換有關氣動元件。

sentences.english: Police recovered their inflatable boat east of the rapids the next day.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，警察在急流東側發現他們仍未漏氣的皮划艇。

sentences.english: It is not practical to fit the piston to the cylinder closely enough to prevent blow-by.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，活塞與氣缸間再嚴密也免不了會漏氣。

sentences.english: Air leakage of a stopper will cause fire during distilling combustibles.
sentences.chinese: 蒸餾易燃物時塞子漏氣引起火災。

sentences.english: The intake or exhaust valves are not sealing properly, again allowing a leak during compression.
sentences.chinese: 進氣閥和排氣閥密封有問題也會造成壓縮時漏氣。

sentences.english: If a leak was present, the patient was extubated.
sentences.chinese: 如果氣囊出現了漏氣，則對病人進行拔管處理。

sentences.english: And hopefully that flat tire is something we will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 並且幸運的是，我們永遠不會忘記那漏氣的輪胎。

sentences.english: If the gas blows back you must turn off the supply, as it is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 如果煤氣管漏氣，你必須關閉送氣管，否則很危險。

sentences.english: Listen to hear if there are any obvious air leaks or excessive exhaust noises.
sentences.chinese: 用心聽一聽，是否有明顯的漏氣聲或過分的排氣噪聲。

sentences.english: Two other types of respirator systems solve the leak problem.
sentences.chinese: 另外兩種呼吸器可解決漏氣問題。

sentences.english: The tires on the old Chevy had the consistency of penny balloons and began to leak.
sentences.chinese: 而舊雪佛來的輪胎又有硬幣大小的氣孔，開始漏氣。

sentences.english: The latest reports show China’s property bubble beginning to lose air. The Wall Street Journal reports
sentences.chinese: 最新報告顯示，中國的房地產泡沫開始漏氣。

definition: to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
